alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 18 at 10:56PM PDT until June 19 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT SUNDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 to 36 degrees could result in frost formation. The Wind Advisory is expiring at 11pm. Winds in most areas have diminished well below advisory levels this evening, though a few locations will have gusty winds into the overnight hours. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 8 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: A frost advisory means that frost is possible. Sensitive outdoor plants may be killed if left uncovered.
